short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically removes all ads from sites without any configuration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes all ads from websites.
The advantage of this extension is that it is fully automatic and does not require any further configuration.
